properties.name: centerOn
properties.label: Center On
properties.description: Center the map on the current user's location or on the bounds of the markers

properties.name: mapMarkers
properties.description: Array of objects that defines the items displayed on the map - each object can have values for 'table', 'sys_id', 'lat', 'long', 'image'
properties.label: Map Markers

properties.name: mapMarkersFields
properties.description: Array of properties from each mapMarker to display
properties.label: Map Marker Fields

properties.name: place
properties.description: A place to focus on the map
properties.label: Place

properties.name: showCircle
properties.description: Show or hide the radius circle overlay on the map
properties.label: Show Circle Overlay

properties.name: circleRadius
properties.description: Radius of the circle overlay in meters (19312.1 = 12 miles)
properties.label: Circle Radius (meters)

properties.name: language
properties.description: Language code for map labels and UI (e.g., 'en', 'fr', 'es')
properties.label: Language

actions.description: Dispatched when a user clicks a marker, related button or a link
actions.label: Map marker item clicked
actions.name: AES_GMAP#MARKER_ITEM_CLICK

actions.description: Dispatched when the user updates the circle on the map
actions.label: Map Circle changed
actions.name: AES_GMAP#MAP_CIRCLE_CHANGED
